errors.title: Oops! Something went wrong
errors.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Don't worry, your data is safe.
errors.helpText: If the problem persists, please contact support.
errors.serverErrorMessage: Our servers encountered an error. Please try again later.
errors.loadErrorMessage: We couldn't load this page. This might be due to a network issue or a temporary server problem. Please try reloading the page.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while processing your request.
